properties.name: spring.speedment.url
properties.description: URL to use when connecting to the database.

properties.name: spring.speedment.host
properties.description: IP address to use when connecting to the database.

properties.name: spring.speedment.port
properties.description: Port to use when connecting to the database.

properties.name: spring.speedment.username
properties.description: Username to use when connecting to the database.

properties.name: spring.speedment.password
properties.description: Password to use when connecting to the database.

properties.name: spring.speedment.license
properties.description: License key to use when connecting to the database.
